name: 被遺棄的雙子 Gemini of the abandoned
name_original: 被遺棄的雙子 Gemini of the abandoned
description:
Hello everyone , this game uses Unity engine, Youtube copyright-free music, Asset Store, Sketchfab to allow commercial use of 3D Model, Freesound copyright-free music. Supports single / double-player mode. Player will act be captured fairy queens to escape the dark laboratory.
Introduction : This game is made using the Unity game engine, language can be set Chinese / English , and use a third-person perspective throughout the game , supports single / double-player mode , player will act be captured fairy queens to escape the dark laboratory, Two players need to share the same blood volume, go through thick and thin together
Story : There are countless planets in the universe. Among them is a strange planet named Araṇya. There are different races of life and extremely rich resources. The humans born on the earth searched for Araṇya through advanced technology , in order to rob everything on the Araṇya , humans led numerous military weapons to forcibly occupy Araṇya, which led to war and caused many lives to disappear. Among them, the queen of fairy were eventually captured by humans and the forest was burned. The queen sisters were also forcibly taken away and locked into the ground floor of a temporary headquarters established by humans ...
WASD : move
E : interactive
ESC : menu
ENTER : chat (multiplayer only)
Right Mouse : attack
Left Mouse : enter
Space : jump
Main menu and in-game language selection (Chinese / English)
Errors that cannot currently be ruled out:
✱ If there is an error while loading the level, please to 選擇關卡Level select the next correct level , thanks for your consideration for any inconvenience caused。
